TopicTitle: Take the previous sentence, and add to it.

Articles.Content:
The purpose of this game is to take a sentence and add a few words to it. Rephrasing parts of a sentence is fine, but try not to remove anything, and don't add too much at a time. Once a sentence gets longer than a few lines we can start a new sentence.

Starting sentence: I like sandwiches.
I like sandwiches but it's hard to eat them in a spacesuit.
I like to eat sandwiches in the morning but it's hard to eat them in a spacesuit
I like to eat sandwiches in the morning, it's hard to though, when you eat in a spacesuit.
I like to eat sandwiches in the morning, it's hard to though, when you eat in a spacesuit indubitably.
I like to eat and chomp on sandwiches in the morning, it's quite hard to though, when you eat them in a spacesuit, indubitably.

I like to eat and chomp on ham and cheese sandwiches in the morning, it's quite hard to though, when you eat them in a spacesuit, indubitably.

Edited August 10, 2018 by roboslacker
accidentaly dropped a word.
By any means I like to eat and chomp on ham and cheese sandwiches in the morning, it's quite hard to though, when you eat them in a spacesuit, indubitably.

By any sort of means I like, of course, to eat and chomp and chow and a whole lot of other synonyms for chomp, on ham and cheese and even tomato, sometimes, sandwiches in the morning, it's quite hard to though, when you eat them in a spacesuit, indubitably.

As for me, by any sort of means I like, of course, to eat and chomp and chow and a whole lot of other synonyms for chomp, on ham and cheese and even tomato, sometimes, sandwiches in the morning, it's quite hard to though, when you eat them in a spacesuit, indubitably.

As for me and my friends, we like to, by any sort of means I like, and my friends,  of course, to eat and chomp and chow and a whole lot of other synonyms for chomp, on ham and cheese and even tomato, sometimes, sandwiches in the morning, it's quite hard to though, when you eat them in a stiff Accapello Program spacesuit, indubitably.

As for me and my friends, we would really like to, by any means I like, and my friends, of course, to eat and chomp and chow and a whole lot of other synonyms for chomp, on ham, cheese, mayonaise, mustard, egg, lettuce, bacon, and even tomato sandwiches in the morning. It's quite hard to though, when you eat them in a stiff Accapello Program spacesuit, indubitably.

Spoiler

The sentence is long enough now that the next person can start a new sentence.

The corporation had originally decided that a preliminary restructuring of it's assets would have to be rescheduled in order for it to be on time.

New sentence done.

As for me and my friends, we would really like to, by any means I like, and my friends, of course, to eat and chomp and chow and a whole lot of other synonyms for chomp, on ham, cheese, mayonaise, mustard, egg, lettuce, bacon, and even tomato sandwiches in the morning. It's quite hard to though, when you eat them in a stiff Accapello Program spacesuit, indubitably, unless the corporation had originally decided that a preliminary restructuring of it's assets would have to be rescheduled in order for it to be on time when a new sentence done.﻿

ugh.

New sentence: Jeb is veteran.
Jeb is a veteran of the mun mission.
Jeb is a mission of the Mun rescue mission.
Jeb is a mission veteran of the Mun rescue mission.
Jebediah Kerman is a mission veteran of the Mun rescue mission

(let that be a lesson to me, posting late at night)

Jebediah Kerman is a mission veteran of the Mun rescue rescue mission.
Jebediah Kerman is a mission veteran of the rescue mission for the Munar rescue rescue robot malware test mission.
Can we say that Jebediah Kerman is a mission veteran of the rescue mission for the Munar rescue rescue robot malware test mission?
Can we say that Jebediah Kerman is one of the mission veterans from the rescue mission for the Munar rescue of the 6th robot malware rescue test mission?

The man who carries the title of "Jebediah Kerman" is one of the oldest and best kerbonauts, because he had participated in the rescue mission that was required because of a robot malware test on the munar surface.

The Kerbal who was given the name or title of "Jebediah Kerman" is one of the most experienced and high quality kerbonauts, on the grounds that he had played a key and instrumental role in the rescue/retrieval mission that was necessitated by an autonomous machine's malicious software experiment on the surface of that orbiting body known by the inhabitants of the planet Kerbin as "The Mun."
